g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'Time' for a time scale with values from Wednesday, 01 January 2020, 12:00:00 AM to Saturday, 01 January 2050, 12:00:00 AM
Y-axis titled 'GHG/GDP variation (cB)' for a linear scale with values from -120 to 0
Title text 'Influence of economic and demographic growth on economic decarbonization requirements for a -2.89 cB/year pathway'
g.text: Influence of economic and demographic growth on economic decarbonization requirements for a -2.89 cB/year pathway
